title: The $90 Billion Squeeze: What the Triad's Budget Really Means
description: Two massive funding streams converge. The $40.5B DHP budget alongside the new $50B Rural Health Transformation Program.

title: The MHS Triad Part 2: The Capability Stack
description: H2F proves the doctrine works: 35% fewer injuries, 37% fewer suicides. The telehealth landscape and what it means for contractors.

title: The MHS Triad Part 1: Meet the Three Leaders
description: Keith Bass, Emil Michael, and Admiral Darin Via. The new MHS command structure is set.

title: We're the Department of War Now
description: EO 14347 authorized 'Department of War' as a secondary title. Defense.gov redirects to war.gov.

title: The Audit Mandate: Why Everything Has to Work Now
description: DoD must achieve a clean audit opinion by December 31, 2028. Section 1002 gives this mandate teeth.

title: The Oura Disaster: Why the $96M Wearables Deal Died
description: The contract didn't die because WHOOP filed a protest. It died because DHA couldn't audit the data.
